comment: Hello Akashi/gamer/dancer!!!! You are a jugaadu person that do smart work and always wanted to put less efforts😝. comment: Akash, man the day we met. Your parents were so worried about you surviving in Indore. The first guy from astro dept I met. But u turned out to be the complete opposite of what I expected, Lmao. Ur energy is super infectious man. Keep killing it, btw ur buns have upgraded to a 9.
name: Sparsh Arya

comment: Hey Akash ! Too much talented person. I have a question for u akash,  How are u so talented,? u are a pro gamer, dancer and very intelligent person. I learned  lot of things from u, like Quantum neural network ! All the best akash for ur future! Stay in touch!
